name: Friday night funkin's SD (Full week)
description:
Disclaimer:
I did not make the art for the BG's, credit goes to the very talented Tassaudra and Stardust tunes.

Friday Night Funkin SD Is a complete Week 6 mod that features:

  • Remixes for Senpai, Roses, and Thorns
  • Charts for Normal and Hard (Try Easy mode for a telepathic rap battle)
  • Recolors and minor sprite edits
  • Original music that replaces Lunchbox, LunchboxScary, and gameOver-pixel 
  • An (optional) original song that replaces Thorns.

FNFSD Revamped includes:

  • All new vocals, charts, and tweaked instrumentals for the 3 base songs         (Senpai, Roses, Thorns)
  • Remastered vocals, instrumentals, and a Rechart for Starstruck
  • Cleaned up sprites
  • A bonus song in freeplay for an extra challenge
